#include<iostream>
#include<math.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int n,ans=0,m,t;
    //cin>>t;
    //while(t--)
    //{
              ans=0;
    cin>>n;
    while(n)
    {
            m=log2(n);
             ans++;
            n=n-pow(2,m);
    }
    cout<<ans<<endl;
//}
}
